text: Kandi Allah yarutishije bamwe muri mwe abandi mu butunzi. Nyamara ba bandi barutishijwe abandi, ntibashobora kwemera guha imitungo yabo abacakara babo kugira ngo bareshye mu butunzi. (Ese niba mutemera kureshya n’abagaragu banyu, ni gute mureshyeshya Imana n’ibigirwamana?) None se bahakana ingabire za Allah
